column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////As we were leaving
column2: we asked one more time to see the manager. He came out and was very kind and apologetic and insisted upon giving us a box of pastries to leave with. This was the appropriate response. We didn't complain to him to try to get something out of it
column3: but rather to make him aware of the training his staff so clearly needs.
